buildTarget.description: The target used to build the library with the ng-packagr

releasePackageJson.description: The path to the package.json used for the release

versionPlaceholder.description: The placeholder string that gets replaced by the corresponding version in your package.json

ngVersionPlaceholder.description: The placeholder string that gets replaced by the corresponding angular versions for the package in your package.json

styles.description: List of root style files that should be copied to the bundle directory with all referenced files

assets.description: List of static assets that should be copied to the bundle directory

additionalTargets.description: List of additional targets that should be run

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.
